Package xappy :: Module _checkxapian
[frames] | no frames]

Module _checkxapian

source code

_checkxapian.py: Check the version of xapian used.

Raises an ImportError on import if the version used is too old to be used at all.



Variables
  min_xapian_version = (1, 0, 6)
  missing_features = {}
  versions = (1, 0, 6)
